name: Odds Against Tomorrow
summary_text: Dave Burke hires two very different debt-burdened men for a bank robbery. Suspicion and prejudice threaten to end their partnership.

name: 1987: When the Day Comes
summary_text: In 1987 Korea under an oppressive military regime, the unlawful interrogation and death of a college student ignite ordinary citizens to fight for the truth and bring about justice.

name: Gantz: Perfect Answer
summary_text: Kato's (Ken'ichi Matsuyama) death changes Kurono's (Kazunari Ninomiya) view of life completely. He decides to keep fighting until he earns 100 points so that he can bring back Kato. GANTZ ...                See full summary »

name: Sexual Chronicles of a French Family
summary_text: Three generations of a French family open up about their sexual experiences and desires after young Romain is caught masturbating in his biology class.

name: Martín (Hache)
summary_text: 19-year-old Argentina Martin has a nearly fatal drug overdose. After that his mother sends him to Madrid, where his film director father (also called Martin) lives with his new much younger lover Alicia and bisexual actor friend Dante.

name: High Risk
summary_text: After failing to save his wife from 'The Doctor', Kit Li is working as a bodyguard and secret stunt double for the cowardly martial arts film star Frankie Lane. Frankie attends an ...                See full summary »

name: Crazy
summary_text: Benjamin is a 16 year old, paralyzed on one side of his body, with lousy grades in math, who switches to a boarding school to reach grammar school. Acclimatization to the new environment is...                See full summary »

name: Az ötödik pecsét
summary_text: In Budapest in 1944, a watchmaker, a book seller and a carpenter are drinking in a bar with the owner, when they are joined by a stranger. The watchmaker asks a hypothetical question that will change their lives.

name: Black
summary_text: A 15-year-old girl in a black gang in Brussels must choose between loyalty and love when she falls for a Moroccan boy from a rival gang. The city of Brussels, plagued by high rates of youth...                See full summary »

name: Postaci
summary_text: Adem is a postman and he wants to marry Sevtap who is the sister of Latif who lives in Germany but he doesn't want his sister marry Adem. Adem doesn't give up and he will try everything to get married to Sevtap.

name: Man of La Mancha
summary_text: The funny story of mad but kind and chivalrous elderly nobleman Don Quixote who, aided by his squire Sancho Panza, fights windmills that are seen as dragons to save prostitute Dulcinea who is seen as a noblewoman.

name: Follow the Fleet
summary_text: A Navy sailor tries to rekindle a romance with the woman he loves while on liberty in San Francisco.

name: Incir Reçeli 2
summary_text: After losing the woman he loves in the original Fig Jam, Metin (Halil Sezai Paracikoglu) finds himself seriously alone. His life is a repetitive round of singing at a bar and grieving for ...                See full summary »

name: The Skeptic
summary_text: A lawyer who doesn't believe in ghosts is haunted after moving into a family mansion.

name: Flesh and the Devil
summary_text: Childhood friends are torn apart when one of them marries the woman the other once fiercely loved.

name: Summerland
summary_text: During World War II, an Englishwoman opens her heart to an evacuee after initially resolving to be rid of him in this moving journey of womanhood, love and friendship.

name: Watchers
summary_text: A boy takes in a stray dog, later discovering that it is an ultra-intelligent runaway being stalked by a dangerous creature from the same genetic research lab.

name: Girls on Top
summary_text: Inken (Diana Amft) is an eighteen-year-old girl, frustrated for not having had an orgasm yet with her boyfriend. Her two best friends are Vicky (Felicitas Woll), who is in the same ...                See full summary »

name: Hind Ka Napak Ko Jawab
summary_text: A sequel to MSG Lion Heart, this story is about a secret agent equipped with weapons who is all set to take on the enemies.

name: Private Valentine: Blonde & Dangerous
summary_text: When fluffy, bubble gum movie star Megan Valentine suddenly finds herself broke and humiliated in the public eye, she wanders from the wreckage of a car accident and witlessly enlists in the U.S. Army hoping in vain that it will change her life.

name: Beneath
summary_text: Christy (Zehetner) returns to her hometown years after a car accident that disfigured her older sister. Haunted by the accident in which she was the driver, she learns that her worst nightmares have either come true ... or are about to.

name: Pursuit of the Graf Spee
summary_text: In the first major naval battle of World War II, the British Navy must find and destroy a powerful German warship.

name: Ma ma
summary_text: In the aftermath of a tragedy a woman, Magda, reacts with a surge of newfound life that engulfs her circle of family and friends.

name: Yuvvraaj
summary_text: Two estranged brothers must learn to work together to claim their rightful share of an inheritance left solely to their eldest sibling.

name: Bad Biology
summary_text: Driven by biological excess, a man and a woman search for sexual fulfillment, unaware of each other's existence. Unfortunately, they eventually meet, and the bonding of these two very unusual human beings ends in a god awful love story.

name: Cetvrti covek
summary_text: A man awakens from a two-month-long coma with total amnesia and sets out to discover the truth about his identity.

name: Alice's Restaurant
summary_text: A cinematic adaption of Arlo Guthrie's classic song story.

name: The Pearl of Death
summary_text: When a valuable pearl with a sinister reputation is stolen, Sherlock Holmes must investigate its link to a series of brutal murders.

name: Laal Kaptaan
summary_text: In an 18th century setting, a Naga sadhu in India sets out on a journey across Bundelkhand to seek revenge for an injustice committed in the past.

name: Time Out of Mind
summary_text: George seeks refuge at Bellevue Hospital, a Manhattan intake center for homeless men, where his friendship with a fellow client helps him try to repair his relationship with his estranged daughter.

name: The Cleansing Hour
summary_text: Another successful "exorcism" streamed online - or so it seems. Can the "exorcist", producer and their team bring the ratings up? Ratings skyrocket, when a real demon gets involved.

name: Battle of the Warriors
summary_text: Story centers on a battle during China's Warring States Period, a series of civil wars, which spanned from the 5th to the 3rd century B.C. Based on a popular Japanese manga, which was in turn based a Japanese novel inspired by Warring States history in China.

name: Yang guang can lan de ri zi
summary_text: The story of four teenagers in Beijing during the Cultural Revolution.

name: Ek Thi Daayan
summary_text: When gifted magician Bobo finds himself assailed by hallucinations and seeks professional help, he learns he's being haunted by a sinister spirit.

name: In Enemy Hands
summary_text: When American submarine Swordfish is torpedoed the survivors are picked up by a passing German U-boat but an outbreak of meningitis threatens all aboard.

name: Stockholm
summary_text: It starts with a guy trying to get a girl he met at a party to like him. She refuses but he doesn't give up and story continues in a long and interesting conversation between them during which he manages to gain her attention.

name: The Four Seasons
summary_text: Three middle-aged wealthy couples take vacations together in Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter. Along the way we are treated to mid-life, marital, parental and other crises.

name: The Jazz Singer
summary_text: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of being a popular singer.

name: Milyarder
summary_text: A train station official wins the lottery but has to hide it from the other villagers. When the truth comes out, he losts his mind and finds himself in emptiness.

name: It Happened on Fifth Avenue
summary_text: Two homeless men move into a mansion while its owners are wintering in the South.

name: The Death of Dick Long
summary_text: Dick died last night, and Zeke and Earl don't want anybody finding out how. That's too bad though, cause news travels fast in small-town Alabama.

name: Hercules Reborn
summary_text: When a young man's bride is kidnapped by an evil king, he turns to Hercules for help. The fallen hero has been living in exile, banished for killing his family, but the young man's courage ...                See full summary »

name: On the Line
summary_text: A shy advertising employee meets his dream girl on the El train, but doesn't remember to get her phone number, resulting in an all-out search for the mystery girl

name: Gulliver's Travels
summary_text: A doctor washes ashore on an island inhabited by little people.

name: Alf Mabrook
summary_text: A guy lives the same day over and over and deals with the same events each time which changes the way he looks to his life.

name: The Myth of the American Sleepover
summary_text: Four young people navigate the suburban wonderland of metro-Detroit looking for love and adventure on the last weekend of summer.

name: Gone
summary_text: Romantic English couple meets a disarming American psychopath while vacationing in Australia.

name: Hadi Insallah
summary_text: PuCCa is a broadcaster. When she applies for a new job, she meets a man.

name: Journey to the Edge of the Universe
summary_text: A journey through space and time.

name: Medium Cool
summary_text: A TV news reporter finds himself becoming personally involved in the violence that erupts around the 1968 Democratic National Convention.

name: Ride
summary_text: A mother travels cross-country to California to be with her son after he decides to drop out of school and become a surfer.

name: VAN valami furcsa és megmagyarázhatatlan
summary_text: A trip to Lisbon helps a nerdy guy who is quickly approaching 30 finally get his mojo back.

name: Te shu shen fen
summary_text: A cop goes undercover in a ruthless underworld organization to stop a gang leader, only to put himself in great danger after being exposed by his former protégé and best friend.

name: Bart Got a Room
summary_text: While Danny's father and mother independently search for love, Danny is on his own desperate quest to find a prom date. Danny's search becomes progressively more pathetic once he and his family learn that Bart, the school's biggest dweeb, not only secured a date for the prom, but got a hotel room as well.

name: Pin
summary_text: Isolated by his strange parents, Leon finds solace in an imaginary friend, which happens to be an anatomy doll from his father's doctor office. Unfortunately, the doll begins to take over Leon's life, and his sister's life as well.

name: Nuvvu Naaku Nachchav
summary_text: Venkateswarlu, aka Venky, comes Hyderabad to his father's friend's house where he meets an engaged girl . Things turn upside down when she expresses her love for him .

name: Last Dance
summary_text: A lawyer assigned to the clemency case of a woman on death row finds himself forming a deep friendship with her while he tries to prevent her impending execution.

name: Jariskatsis mama
summary_text: An old man goes to visit his wounded son in a hospital, but it turns out that he's already been released and is back on the front lines. Reluctant to return home empty-handed, he tries to follow and find him.

name: Mid-August Lunch
summary_text: Gianni is a middle-aged man living in Rome with his imposing and demanding elderly mother. His only outlet from her and the increasing debt into which they are sinking, are the increasingly...                See full summary »

name: Bænken
summary_text: Kaj is an alcoholic living on the money the Danish state is providing him. Him and his friends spend their time drinking beer at a public bench. One day Kaj's life turns upside down when a young lady and her child moves in next to him.

name: American Hero
summary_text: Melvin, a reluctant Superhero, lives only for crime, women and drugs - until he realises that the only way he will ever get to see his estranged son is to go straight and fulfil his potential as a crime fighter.

name: Open Water 3: Cage Dive
summary_text: Three friends filming an audition tape for an extreme reality-TV show find themselves stranded in shark-infested waters, turning their recording into a bloody diary of death. Do they have what it takes to survive the open water?

name: One Last Thing...
summary_text: A young man with a terminal illness makes an unconventional request on local television.

name: Hanzo
summary_text: A man is lost at infancy and gets raised by bears in the woods. He acts as a bear and shows wild behavior. After he encounters a group of miners and attacks them, the locals start a man hunt and events follow.

name: Joshy
summary_text: Joshy's fiancée kills herself. 4 months later, Joshy's friends hope to cheer him up at the cabin in Ojai, CA, rented for his bachelor party weekend. Starting at the local bar, things get wild.

name: Two Men in Town
summary_text: A former bank robber is released after 10 years in prison. He gets help from a social-worker, but gets harassed by an old cop from his past.

name: Fear Island
summary_text: Five students on spring break meet at a secluded island cabin for a weekend getaway. After a night of music, drinking and getting re-acquainted the five friends are shocked to find the cabin's caretaker murdered and the only boat off the island gone. Stranded on the island they become the prey of a mysterious killer who seems bent on revenge for something the friends have done. They must defend ...                See full summary »

name: Daens
summary_text: In the 1890s, Father Adolf Daens goes to Aalst, a textile town where child labor is rife, pay and working conditions are horrible, the poor have no vote, and the Catholic church backs the ...                See full summary »

name: The Scarlet Pimpernel
summary_text: A noblewoman discovers her husband is The Scarlet Pimpernel, a vigilante who rescues aristocrats from the blade of the guillotine.

name: King of the Ants
summary_text: A young drifter discovers his true calling when he's hired by a mobster to stalk and kill a prominent accountant, and then decides to seek revenge when the stingy thugs try to kill him rather than pay him.

name: Sundays at Tiffany's
summary_text: A grown woman's imaginary friend from childhood returns with some advice about her upcoming marriage.

name: Michael Madana Kama Rajan
summary_text: A comedy of errors with identical quadruplets, separated at birth, coming together as adults.

name: Child of God
summary_text: A dispossessed, violent man's disastrous attempt to exist outside the social order.

name: Rakhta Charitra
summary_text: A killer bandit decides to become a politician in order to avenge deaths in his family.

name: Dans Paris
summary_text: After a love affair ends badly, a young Parisian named Paul (Romain Duris) sinks into the same kind of deep depression that led his sister to kill herself. He moves back home with his ...                See full summary »

name: Godzilla: Tokyo S.O.S.
summary_text: Mothra and her fairies return to Japan to warn mankind that they must return Kiryu to the sea, for the dead must not be disturbed. However Godzilla has survived to menace Japan leaving Kiryu as the nation's only defense.

name: Carolina
summary_text: A young woman escapes her wildly eccentric family in search for a life of normalcy.

name: His Kind of Woman
summary_text: A deported gangster's plan to re-enter the USA involves skulduggery at a Mexican resort, and gambler Dan Milner is caught in the middle.

name: Nancy Drew and the Hidden Staircase
summary_text: A bit of an outsider struggling to fit into her new surroundings, Nancy and her pals set out to solve a mystery, make new friends, and establish their place in the community.

name: Anacleto: Agente secreto
summary_text: Adolfo, a thirty something security guard, is going through a bad patch. Not only his lifetime girlfriend has just to finished with him to be a guy with no ambition but, moreover, he ...                See full summary »

name: Incident at Loch Ness
summary_text: A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster.

name: The Big Sky
summary_text: The success of the journey focuses on keeping the Indian girl alive as well as themselves to complete trade with the Blackfeet.

name: The Long Voyage Home
summary_text: A merchant ship's crew tries to survive the loneliness of the sea and the coming of war.

name: Whipped
summary_text: Three egotistical swingers, who think they're God's gift to women, end up having their friendships tested when all three of them pick up and start dating the same woman.

name: Dogs Don't Wear Pants
summary_text: Juha has lost his wife in a drowning accident. Years after he still feels numb and unable to connect with people. Meeting Mona, a dominatrix, changes everything.

name: My Blind Brother
summary_text: The rivalry between two brothers reaches a fever pitch during a charity swim competition.

name: The Theatre Bizarre
summary_text: A modern horror omnibus inspired by the over-the-top shocks of Paris' early 20th century 'Theatre du Grand Guignol'. Enola Penny sneaks into an abandoned theater and witnesses six bizarre tales.

name: Labyrinth of Passion
summary_text: A camp melodrama/comedy about Sexilia (a nymphomaniac), Sadec (a gay Islamic terrorist), Riza Niro (the son of the emperor of Tiran), and Queti (the daughter of a dry-cleaner). When Riza ...                See full summary »

name: I Love You, Daddy
summary_text: When a successful television writer's daughter becomes the interest of an aging filmmaker with an appalling past, he becomes worried about how to handle the situation.

name: Mandira Filozofu
summary_text: Mustafaali (45), as a person who left the modern life behind him and lives in Cokertme Village, spends his days by reading books. Mustafaali, a person who is against working, satisfies all ...                See full summary »

name: A Frozen Flower
summary_text: A historical drama set in the Koryo dynasty and focused on the relationship between a king and his bodyguard.

name: Overcomer
summary_text: A high-school basketball coach volunteers to coach a troubled teen in long-distance running.

name: Song for a Raggy Boy
summary_text: The true story of a single teacher's courage to stand up against an untouchable prefect's sadistic disciplinary regime and other abuse in a Catholic Reformatory and Industrial School in 1939 Ireland.

name: Scooby-Doo and the Reluctant Werewolf
summary_text: Shaggy is turned into a werewolf, and it's up to Scooby, Scrappy and his girlfriend to help him win the contest.

name: Fists in the Pocket
summary_text: A young man takes drastic measures to rid his dysfunctional family of its various afflictions.

name: Born to Raise Hell
summary_text: A US drugs cop in Bucharest is up against a Russian gun and drug trafficker employing cute women and a Gypsy gang leader, who plunders, rapes and kills the young and rich. Lots of fighting and shooting.

name: Midnight Movie
summary_text: A midnight showing of an early 1970's horror movie turns to chaos when the Killer from the movie comes out of the film to attack those in the theater.

name: Flesh Gordon
summary_text: Emperor Wang is leader of the planet Porno and sends his mighty "Sex Ray" towards Earth, turning everyone into sex-mad fiends. Only one man can save the Earth, football player Flesh Gordon

name: The Gateway
summary_text: A particle physicist grieving over the loss of her husband in a car crash travels to a parallel world to find him again, with dire consequences for her family.

name: Proxy
summary_text: The life of three parents who have all shared the loss of a child. Motives are not what they seem and sanity is in short supply in this thriller.

name: Mockingbird Lane
summary_text: Grandpa Sam Dracula is essentially Dracula who assembled Herman because no man was good enough for his daughter Lily, a sexy vampiress. Lily's niece Marilyn the freak is actually normal and...                See full summary »

name: Watch on the Rhine
summary_text: A German-born engineer, his American wife and their children travel from Mexico to the United States to visit her family but their plans are complicated by a Romanian count.

name: Thupparivaalan
summary_text: Detective Kaniyan Poonkundran is hungry for a challenging case to investigate and the mystery of a murdered dog leads to a rival who could be the match for him.

name: Aurangzeb
summary_text: Kingship knows no Kinship and there can be only one Emperor in Aurangzeb's world. In Gurgaon, to bring down a criminal the law has to think like one.

name: The Devil's Rock
summary_text: Set in the Channel Islands on the eve of D Day,two Kiwi commandos, sent to destroy German gun emplacements to distract Hitler's forces away from Normandy, discover a Nazi occult plot to unleash demonic forces to win the war.

name: Darc
summary_text: To bring down a global human trafficking ring, an Interpol agent recruits the help of a brutal criminal with inside knowledge of the yakuza.

name: The Book of Love
summary_text: Jason Sudeikis stars as a widowed New Orleans architect who strikes up an unlikely relationship with teenage runaway Maisie Williams.

name: Dr. Who and the Daleks
summary_text: An eccentric inventor and his companions travel in his TARDIS to the Planet Skaro and battle the evil menace of the Daleks.

name: Aanrijding in Moscou
summary_text: Matty, a 41-year old mother of three with a husband in his midlife-crisis, meets 29-year old Johnny, a truck driver, who takes an interest in her.

name: Humko Deewana Kar Gaye
summary_text: Aditya an engineer, travels to Canada for training. There he meets Jia a beautiful woman from an influential family. Fate keeps pushing the pair together, and even though both are already betrothed to others, Adi and Jia fall in love.

name: Truth or Dare
summary_text: Eight college friends head to a "Haunted Rental" for Halloween. But when they replay the game that made the house infamous, they awaken an evil spirit intent on stealing their souls.

name: The Surprise
summary_text: After signing an agreement with a company that offers to end their lives when they least expect it, a dejected millionaire and a disheartened young woman fall in love and must find a way to get out of their binding contracts.

name: Aaranya Kaandam
summary_text: A mob boss must deal with a disgruntled mistress and a vanishing bag of cocaine.

name: S/O Satyamurthy
summary_text: A rich businessman's son faces multiple challenges after he becomes the sole breadwinner of his family.

name: Bröllopsfotografen
summary_text: When the factory in Molkom shuts down, Robin leaves his beloved hometown to try his luck in Stockholm as a wedding photographer. This experience changes not merely his outlook on life but also his hairstyle.

name: Attack of the Giant Leeches
summary_text: A backwoods game warden and a local doctor discover that giant leeches are responsible for disappearances and deaths in a local swamp, but the local police don't believe them.

name: Rent: Filmed Live on Broadway
summary_text: Set in New York City's gritty East Village, the revolutionary rock opera RENT tells the story of a group of bohemians struggling to live and pay their rent. "Measuring their lives in love,"...                See full summary »

name: Hana to Arisu
summary_text: When two best friends develop a crush on the same boy, they develop a plan to trick him into dating them.

name: Ace High
summary_text: A recently-escaped bandit forms an unlikely alliance with two bounty hunters and an acrobat to get revenge against the people who framed him.

name: Death Machine
summary_text: After a mad genius inventor of killer robots and cyborgs at Chaank Armaments Corp. kills execs, he unleashes his ultimate death machine on the new cute CEO firing him.

name: Bait
summary_text: Martin is a fisherman without a boat, his brother Steven having re-purposed it as a tourist tripper. With their childhood home now a get-away for London money, Martin is displaced to the estate above the harbour.

name: Wonderland
summary_text: There's little wonder in the working-class lives of Bill, Eileen, and their three grown daughters. They're lonely Londoners. Nadia, a cafe waitress, places personal ads, looking for love; ...                See full summary »

name: Chinese Coffee
summary_text: Harry and Jake, two unsuccessful writers, spend a cathartic evening arguing about money, aesthetics, their friendship, and Harry's new manuscript.

name: Gator
summary_text: Agents force a former con man to help them nab a corrupt politician.

name: Chintu Ka Birthday
summary_text: During US invasion of Iraq some illegal migrants are waiting to get back home to India. As one such family prepares to celebrate the 6th birthday of their youngest member Chintu, their kind-hearted Iraqi landlord lends them a helping hand.

name: The Painting
summary_text: Three characters of different social classes escape their unfinished painting in search of the Painter, hoping he will complete it.

name: The World Unseen
summary_text: A drama centered on two women who engage in a dangerous relationship during South Africa's apartheid era.

name: Jonah: A VeggieTales Movie
summary_text: When the singing Veggies encounter some car trouble, they are stranded at an old rundown seafood joint, where nothing is quite as it seems.

name: Journey Into Fear
summary_text: An American ballistics expert in Turkey finds himself targeted by Nazi agents. Safe passage home by ship is arranged for him, but he soon discovers that his pursuers are also on board.

name: Door to Door
summary_text: A man with cerebral palsy is determined to become a salesman.

name: Na Maloom Afraad
summary_text: Three men unwittingly become a prey of a ruthless don after their quick-rich schemes goes awry.

name: Stranded
summary_text: Four astronauts working at a lunar base suffer a meteor strike that brings an infection that leads to paranoia, fear and death.

name: Vulgar
summary_text: A man who performs as a children's birthday party clown tries to piece his life back together after being gang-raped.

name: Die dunkle Seite des Mondes
summary_text: A psychedelic mushroom trip turns a successful lawyer into a wanted man.

name: Cougars Inc.
summary_text: Sam has been expelled from every school and now he must find a creative way to pay for school, which he finds in an escort business entitled Cougars, Inc., leading to lessons he never expected to get.

name: Shaurya: It Takes Courage to Make Right... Right
summary_text: Maj. Siddhant Chaudhary, an Indian Army lawyer, attempts to defend Capt. Javed Khan who is accused of killing a decorated officer. The problem is that Khan does not wish to be defended and freely admits to his crime.

name: Podium
summary_text: Bernand Fréderic is a mediocre bank executive, married, with a son. He used to have another profession: look-a-like of French star Claude François. Now, with the Imitators Gala Night coming...                See full summary »

name: Who Is Cletis Tout?
summary_text: This is a comedy about mistaken identities, a hitman who sees everything in terms of the movies, and a twenty-year-old diamond heist.

name: The Package
summary_text: A courier for a local crime lord must deliver a mysterious package while being chased by a horde of unusual gangsters.

name: Crazy About Her
summary_text: After a magical night together, Adri voluntarily turns himself into the psychiatric institution where Carla lives.

name: A Big Hand for the Little Lady
summary_text: Comedy western in which a traveler bets more money than he can afford in a poker game, and unusual events follow.

name: Too Late for Tears
summary_text: Through a fluke circumstance, a ruthless woman stumbles across a suitcase filled with $60,000, and is determined to hold onto it even if it means murder.

name: Murders in the Rue Morgue
summary_text: A mad scientist seeks to mingle human blood with that of an ape, and resorts to kidnapping women for his experiments.

name: Aisha
summary_text: Chaos results after a wealthy woman decides to turn match-maker for a naive village belle.

name: Candleshoe
summary_text: Welcome to Candleshoe, a stately English manor where a swashbuckling pirate hid a fortune in Spanish doubloons centuries ago. And that's what young orphan Casey and a sly con man are determined to find.

name: Emil i Lönneberga
summary_text: An 8 y.o. Swedish boy always gets into trouble despite good intentions and afterwards ends locked up in a shed. He lives on a farm (before electricity and cars) with his mom, dad, sister, maid, best friend the farmhand and an old woman.

name: Chatrapathi
summary_text: Displaced Sri Lankans in a Vizag port are ruled by a local rowdy. This is the story of Chatrapati Sivaji who overcomes this oppression and how he reunites with his long lost mother and brother.

name: La montagna del dio cannibale
summary_text: A girl and her brother fly to New Guinea to look for a lost expedition, led by her husband, which has vanished in the great jungle.

name: The Search
summary_text: In post-war Berlin, an American private helps a lost Czech boy find his mother.

name: Go West
summary_text: With little luck at keeping a job in the city a New Yorker tries work in the country and eventually finds his way leading a herd of cattle to the West Coast.

name: Eloise
summary_text: Four friends break into an abandoned insane asylum in search of a death certificate which will grant one of them a large inheritance. However, finding it soon becomes the least of their worries in a place haunted by dark memories.

name: Les amants criminels
summary_text: Modern retelling of Hansel and Gretel. After committing a murder, a young couple on the run find refuge in a remote cottage in the woods, where they become trapped by the perverse hermit who lives there.

name: Survival Island
summary_text: A group of teens trapped on an island, and are haunted by a demon hidden inside a pinata.

name: Dragonwyck
summary_text: A simple Connecticut farm girl is recruited by a distant relative, an aristocratic patroon, to be governess to his young daughter in his Hudson Valley mansion.

name: Maigret: Night at the Crossroads
summary_text: Maigret: Night at the Crossroads tells a complex tale of murder, deceit and greed set in an isolated country community.

name: Touchback
summary_text: A man looks back 15 years to the injury that ended his career as a promising high-school football player.

name: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt: Kimmy vs the Reverend
summary_text: Kimmy sets off on her biggest adventure yet. Three states. Explosions. A dancing hamburger. And you, the viewer, get to decide how the story goes.

name: The Kid Brother
summary_text: A sheriff's milquetoast son has a chance to prove himself when a medicine show run by con artists comes into town.

name: Amar
summary_text: Laura and Carlos love each other as if every day was the last, and perhaps that first love intensity is what will tear them apart a year later.

name: A Perfect Ending
summary_text: Rebecca has a very unusual secret, one that not even her best friends know about. The last person on earth she expects to reveal it to is a high priced escort named Paris.

name: Come True
summary_text: A teenage runaway takes part in a sleep study that becomes a nightmarish descent into the depths of her mind and a frightening examination of the power of dreams.

name: Hellowoo goseuteu
summary_text: A man's failed suicide attempt enables him to see ghosts, who later keep following him everywhere. It is now up to him to fulfill their wishes to make them go away.

name: Mr. Pip
summary_text: As a war rages on in the province of Bougainville in Papua New Guinea, a young girl becomes transfixed by the Charles Dickens novel Great Expectations, which is being read at school by the only white man in the village.

name: Jack the Bear
summary_text: Danny DeVito is John Leary, a professional clown, whose wife's death in a car accident has left him to care for his two young boys.

name: The Joke Thief

name: Novitiate

name: Horatio Hornblower: The Fire Ship
summary_text: While Lt. Hornblower studies for his promotion examination, he is distracted by the serious supply problems that face his crew.

name: Mutants
summary_text: In the middle of a zombie apocalypse, a resourceful couple hides out in an isolated abandoned building. The woman is pregnant and the man is infected, slowly transforming into the kind of inhuman monster they are trying to escape.

name: A Promise
summary_text: A romantic drama set in Germany just before WWI and centered on a married woman who falls in love with her husband's protégé. Separated first by duties and then by the war, they pledge their devotion to one another.

summary_text: A true tale of love, liberty and scandal amongst the Edwardian artists' colony in Cornwall

name: Prison
summary_text: The spirit of a long-dead prisoner returns for revenge, haunting the prison's new governor.

name: Closer to the Moon

name: The Kovak Box

name: Don't Go in the House
summary_text: A disturbed young man who was burned as a child by his sadistic mother stalks women with a flamethrower.

name: Lady Sings the Blues
summary_text: The story of the troubled life and career of the legendary Jazz singer, Billie Holiday.

name: Bad Match

summary_text: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.
